Class RegularVMModel

java.lang.Object
RegularVMModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVMModel
public class RegularVMModel extends Object
The RegularVMModel class represents a regular vending machine with its attributes and functionalities. It contains item slots, denominations for balance, transaction history, and methods to manage the machine's operation.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVMModel

      public RegularVMModel(String name)
      Creates a new RegularVMModel object with the given name and initializes its attributes. The vending machine is set up with default denominations and quantities.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the vending machine.

      Get the name of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      The name of the vending machine.

      public ArrayList<ItemSlot> getItemSlots()
      Get the list of item slots in the vending machine.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ItemSlot objects representing the item slots in the vending machine.

      public ArrayList<Denomination> getBalance()
      Get the balance of the vending machine in different denominations.

      Get the transaction history of the vending machine.

      The Transaction object representing the transaction history of the vending machine.

      Parameters:

      public void setBalance(ArrayList<Denomination> balance)
      Set the balance of the vending machine in different denominations. Use this method to update the balance of the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      balance - An ArrayList of Denomination objects representing the new balance to be set for the vending machine.

    • setTotalPayment

      public void setTotalPayment(float totalPayment)
      Set the total payment received by the vending machine. Use this method to update the total payment received by the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      totalPayment - The new total payment to be set for the vending machine.

    • setTotalCost

      public void setTotalCost(float totalCost)
      Set the total cost of items sold by the vending machine. Use this method to update the total cost of items sold by the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      totalCost - The new total cost to be set for the vending machine.

    • addItemSlot

      public void addItemSlot(Item item, float cost, int initQuantity)
      Adds a new item slot to the vending machine with the given item, cost, and initial quantity.
      Parameters:
      item - The item object to be added to the item slot.
      cost - The cost of the item in the slot.
      initQuantity - The initial quantity of items to be added to the item slot.

    • addDenomination

      public void addDenomination(Denomination denomination)
      Adds a new denomination to the vending machine's balance.
      Parameters:
      denomination - The denomination object to be added to the balance.

    • addPayment

      public void addPayment(Denomination denomination)
      Adds a payment to the total payment received by the vending machine. Used when a customer adds money to the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      denomination - The denomination object representing the payment to be added.

    • buyItem

      public void buyItem(ItemSlot itemSlot, float payment)
      Processes a purchase of an item from the vending machine. Decreases the item slot quantity, adds the transaction to the history, and updates total payment and cost.
      Parameters:
      itemSlot - The item slot from which the item is purchased.
      payment - The payment made by the customer for the item.

    • produceChange

      public ArrayList<Denomination> produceChange(float payment, float cost)
      Produces change for a given payment and cost by using the available denominations in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      payment - The payment made by the customer.
      cost - The cost of the item being purchased.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of denominations representing the change to be given to the customer.

    • stockItem

      public void stockItem(ItemSlot itemSlot, int quantity)
      Adds more quantity of an item to its respective item slot in the vending machine's stock.
      Parameters:
      itemSlot - The item slot to which more quantity will be added.
      quantity - The quantity of items to be added to the stock.

    • setItemSlotPrice

      public void setItemSlotPrice(ItemSlot itemSlot, float price)
      Sets the price of an item slot in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      itemSlot - The item slot for which the price will be updated.
      price - The new price to be set for the item slot.
